descriptions:
Introducing our exquisite Squirrel House/Nesting Box, crafted from high-quality cedar wood. Perfectly suited for outdoor use, this charming house is both glued and nailed, ensuring durability and longevity. 

Featuring a captivating burned image of a squirrel on the wall, this nesting box adds a touch of whimsy to any garden or backyard. The removable roof allows for easy cleaning and hassle-free hanging of the box. 

To make installation a breeze, we have thoughtfully included two screws and washers for mounting. No need to worry about finding the right hardware - we've got you covered! 

With outside dimensions of 12x11x10 inches and inside dimensions of 5.75x9 inches, this spacious squirrel house provides ample room for nesting and resting. The squirrel opening measures 3.5 inches, ensuring easy access for our furry friends. 

Constructed with pre-drilled holes and featuring a sturdy construction, your squirrel house will be securely mounted in no time. 

Indulge in the beauty of nature and provide a safe and cozy haven for our adorable squirrels. Bring home our Squirrel House/Nesting Box today and witness the joy it brings to your outdoor space.

Introducing the Squirrel House/Nesting Box, the perfect addition to your outdoor space! Made from high-quality cedar wood, this nesting box is designed to provide a cozy and secure home for our furry friends. 

Crafted with precision, the box is constructed using both glue and nails, ensuring durability and long-lasting performance. But that's not all - the box features a unique burned image of a squirrel on one side, created by the talented artist Drew Senesac. This decorative touch adds a charming and whimsical element to your garden or backyard.

Cleaning and maintenance are a breeze with the removable roof. Simply lift it off to access the inside of the box for cleaning or hanging the box in a preferred location. We've also included two screws and washers for easy mounting, so you can effortlessly install the box wherever you desire.

The Squirrel House/Nesting Box is thoughtfully designed to provide comfort for our furry friends. The spacious inside dimensions of 5.75x9 inches offer plenty of room for squirrels to build their nests and raise their young. The squirrel opening, measuring 3.5 inches in diameter, ensures easy access for squirrels while keeping larger animals out.

With outside dimensions of 12x11x10 inches, this nesting box is the perfect size to blend seamlessly into your outdoor space. The natural cedar wood not only adds a touch of elegance but also provides excellent insulation, keeping the interior cozy and warm.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to create a welcoming habitat for squirrels in your backyard. Get your Squirrel House/Nesting Box today and enjoy the delightful sights and sounds of these adorable creatures right outside your window.

Our construction process ensures durability, with the box being both glued and nailed for extra strength. But what truly sets this squirrel house apart is the beautiful burned image of a squirrel on the wall, created by the talented artist Drew Senesac. It adds a touch of charm and whimsy to your backyard.

Cleaning and hanging the box is a breeze, thanks to the removable roof. Simply lift it off to access the interior and easily hang it back in place. Plus, we've included two screws and washers for mounting, so you can have it set up in no time.

The dimensions of this squirrel house are perfect for accommodating our furry friends. The outside dimensions measure 12x11x10 inches, providing plenty of space, while the inside dimensions are 5.75x9 inches. The squirrel opening has a diameter of 3.5 inches, allowing squirrels to enter and exit comfortably.

Rest assured, we've thought of everything when it comes to convenience. The box comes with two pre-drilled holes for easy mounting, making installation a breeze. And with the included screws and washers, you'll have everything you need to secure it in place.

Give squirrels a safe and cozy home with our Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Bring a touch of nature to your backyard and enjoy watching these adorable creatures thrive. Order yours today and create a haven for squirrels in your outdoor space!
